result.title: Validation of the behavioural model and the persuasion and reaction mechanisms
result.description: This deliverable will include the full validation of the behavioural model utilized during the pilot phase. Moreover, this deliverable will include the relation between engagement on the GreenSoul platform and saving achieved. Also it will include the evaluation of the persuasion and reaction mechanisms based on the result of the pilot phase. If it is required, this document will include updates in the methodologies for the analaysis of socio-economic factors and human behaviour.
